name: Heart of Iron
flavorText: The blessed armor of Olenna the 'Iron Crusader' eventually passed to her apprentice, who proudly wore it alongside her own. Though she took her master's name, she was ultimately known with a very different moniker. -- Abd al-Hazir, The Crusaders
flavorTextHtml: The blessed armor of Olenna the 'Iron Crusader' eventually passed to her apprentice, who proudly wore it alongside her own. Though she took her master's name, she was ultimately known with a very different moniker. -- Abd al-Hazir, The Crusaders

secondary.textHtml: Gain Thorns equal to 257% of your Vitality.
